name: Neptune: Arena FPS
description: Classic arena fps style gameplay mixed with modern and futuristic elements, where the only thing that matters is the skill.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10.0 Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Might not work correctly with integrated GPUs.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/10 Processor: AMD FX-8XXX - Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 - AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Might not work correctly with integrated GPUs.
